twitch_info.title: I Wanna Ponder 100% Playthrough - Part 9
twitch_info.description: lasers 6 is legitimately the hardest thing ive ever done

message.body: Tower Defense? You mean all those bonus games count towards stars as well?
How long was the chess avoidance? :o
also yeah, lasers looks hard already.
Didn't Wolfi talk about "Laser 6" being the worst?
not bad, got a couple of easy pbs
a dance of fire and ice got me into playing it for a while
i did the first level on with 1.5x speed!
i think there is a steam achievement for doing every level on 1.5x speed
because the first level's portal gets decorated with a red lamp after doing it with that speed
so, you have to laser the correct color the correct color blocks
you get a 90 degrees and 90 degrees splitting mirrors?
what if you put the splitting mirror sideways between the red blocks?
put the splitting one where both the red and blue lasers meet
so you definitely have to put a mirror down so you can go up, fiddle with the second mirror up then take the mirror you put down and fiddle with it again in the bottom part
this one just relies on finding out a mechanic
but its more about how the splitter works
thank you kurath you really blew our mind with that information
the latter one is what matters
it splits differently based on which side the beam comes from though
i really do like mirror puzzles
portal fiddles a lot with them
oh boy, the splitting mirror, we have 2 of those
you get to watch max suck at puzzles
I don't even see what you are suposed to do
the splitting mirrors seems crucial in this one
oh boy, you have to use the splitting mirror to get that purple
it doesn't want to make me dance on the floor tho
can i suggest on solving The Puzzle?
i think you need to use a 45 degrees mirror on the right part of the room
only one should do the job
dang we are in the same situation
nah, the splitter's position definitely is the middle of the room
you can't put mirrors into the blocks??
that's why the bottom's part of the screen walls are two blocks solid
i think that spot is like for symmetry
i don't think you have to snipe all of them
i think you should snipe the left one
in that way you have the blue blocks always off
you definitely need the splitting mirror for the bottom part tho
you really can't put inside blocks?
okay no stream is definitely having some issues
i'm using an alternate player for twitch because this old toshiba can't handle the new player
just tell your family to stop using the internet lmao
it took only 10 seconds to search it up on google translate but ok max you don't know what iit means
well that was the solution i had though of soooo darn
maybe you should your mirrors at the bottom tho
i got tired of my old phone bg
what if you were to put the splitting mirror at the top middle
and use a mirror in the middle to hit the blue one
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/477613463145807883/640410826351706133/Screenshot_2019-11-03-06-43-29.png new one (it's the same for both the lock screen and the actual bg)
i never anticipated this one to be as evil as it is
can you place mirrors on spikes?
you can but its disgusting and not worth doing
now if people happen to open your phone they'll go "ahh, weeb"
if somebody opens my phone i'll break their spine
bruh, only at your lock screen, not the home screen
my phone is always with me
my mom saw the bg because she snoops around my phone sometimes
which is LITERALLY the last thing i would've expected her to say upon sight of that
i want ice cream now as well
there isn't, but i used the minecraft command formula
what the fuck even is happening
then stop being one mirror short
you know the name of flandre's theme
and drew a washing machine with the crystal wings
oh yeah i remember that drawing xD
i so want to get a furret plush
kurath is sure enjoying his time
This is the hardest puzzle in the game
a while ago, I don't remember the solution
it was in the last 5 puzzles in the game I did
there is no way you can do the bottom part in 3 mirrors, you need 4 90 degrees mirrors
it's the fact that you need 4 *mirrors* at the bottom part
what if you didn't need 4 mirrors at the bottom part though
how can you do the bottom part in 3 mirrors
maybe 2 90 degrees mirrors and a 45 degree mirror?
this is probably a mental block situation so starting fresh another time might be the answer
i was watching a fat japenese streamer
you want to see a fat japense streamer with depression?
only if you want to see it
